director.name: 朱塞佩·博尼图 Giuseppe Bonito

introduction: SynopsisThe most significant chapters in the life of Mike Bongiorno, one of the fathers of Italian television. A life full of events, many of which were traumatic and hard to elaborate. The story opens in 1971, the year of the show Rischiatutto, when Mike was at the height of his popularity, and unfurls back to his childhood in New York.COMMENTARYHe was born in New York on May 26th, 1924, and on January 3rd, 1954 he presented Arrivi e partenze, the first television programme broadcast by Rai television: two excellent anniversaries to celebrate Mike Bongiorno, one of the “inventors” of Italian television. The story explores even the lesser known aspects of his character and his private life.
